r.d: This package validates and cleanly formats Media Access Control (MAC) addresses. The Net_MAC class can also import a list of MAC address vendors and store them in a database which the class can then use to identify vendors of any MAC address.
r.n: * Updated the license to BSD (per Justin Patrin) * Updated requires to require PHP 5.0 instead of 4.2 (per Mark Wiesemann) * Updated some PEAR CS
